game_description: “With a beautifully realised blend of tactics and physical action, Alliances is a must-have for anyone looking for their next competitive title.” -6DOFReviews.com "It's one of the greatest PVP games I've played, period" - Soul Fox Gaming Wands Alliances is a competitive multiplayer shooter game of intense magic duels and combat. Play in teams of 3v3 and master the tactical aspects of teleportation and spell customization to become the most powerful Wielder of them all. Select your class, choose your spells, and take the fight to the streets. Taste sweet victory by completing your team’s objectives or eliminating the opposing team. Wands Alliances is the spiritual successor to the original VR magic dueling experience, Wands. In Alliances, tactical teleportation is used to traverse levels and dynamic movement make this a VR experience that will challenge seasoned duelists and unlock the hidden talents of the wizard within. Magical mayhem awaits!
Languages: English, Chinese (China), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Spanish (Spain)
review_1: I just wish more people would play this game. It really is a nice game, with having to work up strategies but playing with AI teammates sucks because you can’t communicate with them! P.S. NEEDS UPDATE SOON! Even just a short story/campaign mode!
review_2: Casting spells was fun and all, but I don’t like being locked in locations, it needs free movement
review_3: Fun easy to play only thing is need more players or a community on Facebook

In addition there are different powers offering several advantages. And different classes like healer, protector and attacker. There are also several game modes !!! review_5: Amazing game but it needs more updates the gameplay is pretty good but it needs more players, playing against A.I gets boring and the game hasn’t been updated in a long time
